name: noncompressible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be pressed together or pressed into a smaller space: non-compressible, calcified blood vessels Haematoma is caused by bleeding into a fixed and noncompressible space.
More examplesFewer examplesThe first value is the amount of compression or decompression in compressible fluids, or the amount of velocity changes in noncompressible fluids.This is a non-compressible tubular structure.Contraindications to the therapy included puncture of noncompressible vessels.This test is for those patients whose ankle vessels are non-compressible.The tibial arteries are calcified and noncompressible.
